import tactic --hide

/-

#Goldback conjecture

-/


/- Lemma
If $n$ is an even natural number, then there exits primes $p,q$ such that $n=p+q$.
-/
lemma Goldback (n : ℕ) (hn : even n) : ∃ (p q : ℕ) (hp : prime p) (hq : prime q), n = p + q :=
begin

CP grand challenge
# CP Grand Challenge

## By Chris Birkbeck



# What is this game?

If you can solve any of the following levels I'll buy you as much coffee/beer as you want




Goldback
import tactic --hide

#Goldback conjecture

If $n$ is an even natural number, then there exits primes $p,q$ such that $n=p+q$.
